mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, rcontent, rwriter, rregDate, rblind FROM ouruser.tbl_reply WHERE bno = #{bno} ORDER BY rno DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ouruser.tbl_reply VALUES (ouruser.seq_tbl_reply.NEXTVAL, #{bno}, #{rcontent}, #{rwriter}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE ouruser.tbl_reply SET rcontent = #{rcontent}, rregDate = DEFAULT WHERE rno = #{rno} AND bno = #{bno}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ouruser.tbl_reply WHERE rno = #{rno} AND bno = #{bno}
